publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3420 Sarah Boyack: Energy Saving Week—That the Parliament congratulates the Energy Saving Trust for organising its ninth annual Energy Saving Week from 24 to 30 October 2005; recognises that energy efficiency is the cleanest, safest and cheapest way of reducing carbon dioxide emissions; supports personal energy efficiency targets as the best means of hitting the target of a 20% reduction in carbon dioxide emissions below 1990 levels by 2010, and urges all members to show leadership by supporting the Energy Saving Trust’s "Save Your 20%" campaign which promotes individual responsibility and actions. Supported by: Jackie Baillie*
S2M-3420 Energy Saving Week (lodged on 17 October 2005) Derek Brownlee*, Helen Eadie*, Murray Tosh*, Eleanor Scott*, Iain Smith*, Mrs Mary Mulligan*
S2M-3420 Energy Saving Week (lodged on 17 October 2005) Marilyn Livingstone*, Karen Gillon*, Shiona Baird*, Dr Sylvia Jackson*, Mr David Davidson*, Donald Gorrie*, Trish Godman*
S2M-3420 Energy Saving Week (lodged on 17 October 2005) Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Cathie Craigie*, Roseanna Cunningham*, Mr Andrew Arbuckle*
S2M-3420 Energy Saving Week (lodged on 17 October 2005) Pauline McNeill*
S2M-3420 Energy Saving Week (lodged on 17 October 2005) Cathy Peattie*
S2M-3420 Energy Saving Week (lodged on 17 October 2005) Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*
S2M-3420 Energy Saving Week (lodged on 17 October 2005) Elaine Smith*
S2M-3420 Energy Saving Week (lodged on 17 October 2005) Robin Harper*
